HDF5_BLS.treat

Classes

Models()

This class repertoriates all the models that can be used for the fit.

Treat(frequency, PSD)

This class is a class inherited from the Treat_backend class used to define functions to treat the data.

Treat_backend(frequency, PSD[, ...])

This class is the base class for all the treat classes.

Exceptions

TreatmentError(message)
